titles: A letter from a person of honour, relating the slaughter of a party of 300 horse, by the forces under the command of the Earle of Holland, July 7. 1648.
notes: Dated at end: July 8. From the Head-quarters at Hounslow-heath.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
